<h3 id="X38155">X(38155) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(8), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4-5*(b+c)*a^3+(b^2+10*b*c+c^2)*a^2+5*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-5*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38155) = 5*X(1)-11*X(5056) = 5*X(2)-3*X(30392) = 2*X(3)-5*X(10) = X(3)+5*X(355) = 8*X(3)-5*X(4297) = X(3)-5*X(5790) = 7*X(3)-10*X(6684) = 4*X(3)-5*X(10164) = 11*X(3)-5*X(18481) = 7*X(3)+5*X(18525) = 3*X(3)-5*X(26446) = X(10)+2*X(355) = 4*X(10)-X(4297) = 7*X(10)-4*X(6684) = 11*X(10)-2*X(18481) = 7*X(10)+2*X(18525) = 3*X(10)-2*X(26446) = 8*X(355)+X(4297) = 7*X(355)+2*X(6684) = 4*X(355)+X(10164) = 11*X(355)+X(18481) = 7*X(355)-X(18525) = 3*X(355)+X(26446) = 11*X(5056)-10*X(10171) = 3*X(30392)+5*X(37712)</b>
<p>X(38155) lies on these lines: {1,5056}, {2,28236}, {3,10}, {4,3626}, {5,3244}, {7,30286}, {8,1699}, {30,38098}, {40,4691}, {80,2346}, {145,7989}, {381,28234}, {516,3543}, {517,3845}, {518,38151}, {519,3545}, {547,551}, {758,18908}, {912,3919}, {944,3533}, {946,3625}, {962,4668}, {971,38201}, {1071,3918}, {1125,5067}, {1210,37710}, {1385,16239}, {1478,30424}, {1503,38191}, {1656,13607}, {1737,4315}, {2801,3753}, {2802,38156}, {2829,38213}, {3090,3636}, {3091,3632}, {3241,7988}, {3475,6738}, {3576,3828}, {3579,28190}, {3586,5766}, {3617,5059}, {3621,11522}, {3635,8227}, {3654,28150}, {3655,15723}, {3671,10573}, {3754,14872}, {3822,37725}, {3829,33956}, {3830,28232}, {3853,11362}, {3880,10157}, {3947,10827}, {3950,5816}, {4002,12680}, {4015,14110}, {4311,18395}, {4314,10039}, {4342,12647}, {4678,7991}, {4701,7982}, {4731,10167}, {4745,5657}, {4746,12245}, {4847,5176}, {4848,11246}, {5068,20050}, {5086,6736}, {5102,5847}, {5252,11019}, {5261,12563}, {5288,6915}, {5493,5690}, {5534,30143}, {5542,18391}, {5550,30315}, {5727,13405}, {5731,15708}, {5836,9947}, {5842,38214}, {5846,38146}, {5850,38149}, {5853,38158}, {5854,38161}, {5855,38162}, {5882,9956}, {6347,21569}, {6348,21564}, {6431,13883}, {6432,13936}, {6913,25439}, {8582,17535}, {9590,13620}, {9779,11224}, {10106,17728}, {10165,11539}, {10172,10246}, {10443,17275}, {11219,36006}, {11231,11812}, {12645,13464}, {13411,37711}, {15022,20057}, {15686,28160}, {15690,28186}, {15863,21635}, {16189,20053}, {16859,24987}, {16980,31752}, {17502,38068}, {17542,38059}, {17857,30147}, {19877,30389}, {21627,32426}, {23841,31732}, {28168,31730}, {28172,34638}, {28208,38081}, {28463,38178}</p>
<p>
X(38155) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 37712}, {8, 1699}, {355, 5790}, {3576, 34627}, {5691, 9778}, {5881, 7967}, {11224, 31145}, {37705, 38028}<br>
X(38155) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 10171), (10, 5790), (551, 10175), (946, 38140), (1699, 19925), (3576, 3828), (3817, 5587), (4297, 10164), (4301, 1699), (5657, 4745), (5882, 38028), (7967, 1125), (10164, 10), (10165, 38042), (10246, 10172), (38028, 9956), (38127, 38176), (38140, 18357)<br>
X(38155) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(10164)<br>
X(38155) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (8, 3832, 11531), (8, 19925, 4301), (8, 37714, 19925), (1656, 13607, 15808), (3817, 5587, 38076), (3850, 11278, 946), (4701, 12571, 7982), (5587, 16200, 3545), (5690, 31673, 5493), (5818, 5881, 1125), (5836, 9947, 31803), (5882, 9956, 19862), (9779, 31145, 11224), (9956, 37705, 5882), (10172, 10246, 19883), (11539, 31662, 10165), (38127, 38176, 38098)<br>
</p>
